website_summaries.verdict: Similar in quality to a ceremonial-grade matcha at a reasonable cost.
pros: The powder is finely ground and vibrant green in color
Tea has a pleasant, grassy taste without being bitter
Matcha Wellness is comparable to a ceremonial-grade matcha but at a slightly lower cost
cons: Matcha doesn't froth as much as other brands

customer_reviews.title: I was on the hunt to find the best quality and value for the best price point
customer_reviews.text: I was on the hunt to find the best quality and value for the best price point. My simple search ended up being an intensive learning session about the different grades that are available (low grade culinary all the way to ceremonial). I compared Matcha Konomi Akira Ceremonial grade and the Matcha Wellness Superior Culinary blend. I was pleasantly surprised at the quality of the superior culinary blend! The color, texture and taste is a VERY close runner to the ceremonial grade. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's the real deal and delicious!
customer_reviews.text: I've bought all sorts of Matcha Tea and really do only want the best with good properties and flavour. This is a great price for getting a very high quality product. I make Matcha latte's every day with either organic milk, coconut or almond milk and it's delicious every time. I don't drink coffee anymore as it gives me the jitters now, whereas Matcha tea gives you energy with no jitters and no 'come down crash'. It also makes me more mentally alert than coffee does.
customer_reviews.author: Ziggybaby

customer_reviews.title: Matcha-licious
customer_reviews.text: I’m so impressed with this matcha! I was scared buying online seeing horror stories from certain brands, but this one stood out as being organic and a product of Japan. The green is vibrant, the flavor is fresh, and I will definitely be buying again. I’ve had it for about 6 weeks and I’ve been making 1-2 drinks every week and I still have about half a bag left. Only downside is I can tell it will be a little difficult to get the last bits out when I run low due to the packaging style, however I like that it’s recyclable and has tips/recipe on the back.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Too Much Caffeine
customer_reviews.text: Warning! If you suffer with hypertension and sensitivity to caffeine this may not be your cup of tea. I followed the directions for a cup of tea and it caused my blood to rise very high to the point of feeling dizzy with a nagging headache. The following day I reduced the recommended amount to a 1/2 teaspoon but still suffered the same effects . I like the taste, reminds me of English Breakfast Tea unfortunately it's not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Roz

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Taste and not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely terrible taste and not nearly the amount received to determine paying $10. The directions on the back suggest you use all the bag’s contents for one single smoothie. So you’re already $10 into the smoothie without even adding fruit or milk. You’ll end up making a $15 smoothie that tastes atrocious. Save your money and put it towards a great matcha that mixes well for smoothies.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Durston

customer_reviews.title: Great Tasting Matcha Matcha
customer_reviews.text: I have been disappointed when purchasing Matcha on multiple occasions. I love Matcha and have spent a lot of money at the high end coffee shops purchasing it. Finally I have found the ONE! The quality is high, the taste is slightly bitter, the consistency is fine and silky. This one is on reorder! Please note for high grade Matcha you are not going to receive a large amount when purchasing. I think some people expect a large amount of the product for the price. Just remember high quality comes at a price. This is worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Gloria M

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't taste good at all
customer_reviews.text: I was trying to find a more affordable matcha and picked this one because of the good reviews. However I was disappointed that it didn't taste good at all. Tastes very chalky and the matcha flavor is not strong. I tried it in a matcha latte and another matcha drink. Maybe I'll use it to cook, but don't think it would taste good in baked goods either. Super disappointed because it looked fresh and the price point was good!
customer_reviews.author: Austin Chao

customer_reviews.title: Great energy boost
customer_reviews.text: I was not sure about getting the Matcha but a co-worker highly recommended trying it. I was amazed. Tastes great and the energy I got was just awesome. I love the flavor. It dissolves quickly with some hot water. Can drink without any sugar too. I have not yet tried it in smoothies but will certainly do so. The seller is great with follow up to ensure I was a happy and I got a e-book with all kinds of recipes to try the matcha. I would highly recommend this product from this particular seller.
customer_reviews.author: Viviana

customer_reviews.title: EXPIRED TEA
customer_reviews.text: Just got it in the mail today 4.12.17 and the tea is expired as of November 2016. Disappointing, I want my money back.
customer_reviews.author: mrsbecton

customer_reviews.title: Very good stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Matcha is something I didn't really envision liking that much, but this particular brand has drawn me into the craze. I don't really know much about the different grades so I won't try to pretend I'm an expert, but I will say that this is a very flavorful and smooth drink grade. I have given up coffee for the most part because, while I don't understand why, I do know that the caffeine upper from this tea isn't the rocket ride my pour-over coffees were launching me into. This is a very satisfying drink and flavor, and the price of this is very reasonable. Very good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Bereanwarrior

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Beautiful green color and good flavor which indicates the freshness of this product. Use this in my morning smoothie as well as a matcha latte with almond milk every afternoon as a healthy treat. I grew up drinking Japanese green tea so know a good product when I taste it. While not ceremonial grade, this is a very good product and blends well into healthy drinks. Highly recommend. Will definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: KKY

customer_reviews.title: Not worth your money. Shop whole food are a health food place
customer_reviews.text: Theses are the worst of all. They are not the size you see on line. They are about the size of your 🤚 hand and they are not even halfway full . I’m very very sorry disappointed. I will not be ordering again from them. I’m very very disappointed 😔. I’m on my way to the Whole Foods to get the big bag and it last 30 to 60 days. I really hate I trusted them. Never again.
customer_reviews.author: brenda davis

customer_reviews.title: The best Match I've tried!!!
customer_reviews.text: Superior matcha tea! This is the read deal! Bright, almost neon green, sweet, grassy, fragrant. Delicious! It may seem expensive, but it really goes a long way since you only use 1/2-1 tsp per serving/latte. I love the feeling of a "clean energy" without the jitters or crash. I mix 1 tsp in about 1/4 hot water and shake in a mason jar until completely dissolved and then add in ice and nut milk. I'm totally addicted! As a side note, since I recently discovered this, be careful when purchasing matcha teas--you get what you pay for. Some have fillers such as brown rice meal--this one really is 100%, delicious matcha-ness!
customer_reviews.author: Dolly Spice

customer_reviews.title: Made correctly it's superb, first purchase.
customer_reviews.text: My first taste of matcha was when my daughter in law's father performed the Japanese tea ceremony. That was ceremonial grade matcha. This is very good for culinary grade. Using about 1/16th tsp in a Japanese tea cup of this matcha add just enough almost boiling water to the cup and whisk in a zig-zag pattern until it is foamy. Add a little more water and whisk again. Fill the rest of the cup with water and drink. Be ready to taste the natural sweetness of the tea that leaves no bitter after taste. There is no comparison to this and a tea bag. I was not paid for this opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Pray

customer_reviews.title: Smooth, pure, and tasty!
customer_reviews.text: This matcha is so good! I'm primarily using it for matcha lattes, since matcha is a little too intense for me as just tea, so keep in mind I haven't tried it without milk and some type of sweetener. That being said, it's only considered culinary-grade, but the color and flavor seem much better than other culinary grades I've tried (and leaps and bounds tastier than any big coffee chain's "matcha lattes"). And for the price, I think this is one of the few items I'll subscribe to on Amazon. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: katelyn

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: Very expensive product for no reason. I usually buy 5x more of the same product for the same price. Look else where. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Moe Jaber

customer_reviews.title: Love my Matcha Lattes
customer_reviews.text: I was an avid coffee drinker until about a year and half ago when I discovered Matcha Green Tea. I have purchased this brand a few times of the past year and really like the quality and price value. At first I thought the 1oz package was so small but once I refill my Matcha jar I realize it is more than plenty to last me at least a month. LOL. I am not an expert on Matcha but I have been very satisfied with the Matcha Wellness brand. Great flavor and their eco friendly packaging is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Great tea/great company
customer_reviews.text: I received my order timely and almost immediately made a cup of tea. I was pleased with the smooth, fine quality of the matcha which dissolved quickly and easily. With each cup, I become more pleased with the consistency and flavor of this product. Thank you for your email explaining how to make a cup of matcha tea. Such outstanding customer service will be rewarded in the marketplace I am sure.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: highly recommend! taste great!
customer_reviews.text: I tried different matcha and so far I will stay with this one. I can tell the product is pure, real matcha the moment I drink it you can taste the creaminess of it, the only thing i don’t like when it gets clumps, but its okay still taste good and it does dissolve itself when I start drinking it. this is my second time purchasing it, Definitely will purchase more.It taste like my favorite Ice Matcha Green tea latte at Starbucks. YUM!
customer_reviews.author: Krissy

customer_reviews.title: I wish “0” stars was an option. DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I feel duped on this product. It looks like a single serving packet out of a larger set of packets. This is tooooo much money for this tiny little packet. The picture is extremely deceptive. I have since found better options. I am an AVID amazon buyer. I have never been so disappointed. 🤷🏽‍♀️ Can’t get my money back but I defiantly won’t EVER buy this product NOR from this seller EVER EVER again.
customer_reviews.author: consumer

customer_reviews.title: Matcha had a strong fishy aftertaste which lasted all day ...
customer_reviews.text: Matcha had a strong fishy aftertaste which lasted all day. Will not drink another cup. Will gladly return for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: BeesWax

customer_reviews.title: Great Green Tea Powder!!!
customer_reviews.text: This tea is great!!! I just came back from Japan and brought some packs but not enough. People at work love green tea so I looked and found this on Amazon. Just mix 1/2 of tea spoon with about 16 oz of cold water, it is delicious and refreshing. The green powder is bright green as pictured. I hope this tea bag is on Amazon forever. I did not expect to find organic tea from Japan. It is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: T.V. in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for Culinary grade matcha!
customer_reviews.text: I use it in my latte occasionally. The name Superior Culinary is justified because it is pretty good quality for just a culinary grade. The color is nice green, the powder whisks well, and it tastes alright in a latte but I have not tried straight without any milk. So if you are looking for a matcha latte drink that will be more affordable - this could be your call. If you are picky and rather pay a bit more but enjoy a better tasting matcha, then go with the ceremonial grade. I am quite happy with the quality of this brand. And their ceremonial grade matcha can be enjoyed straight. You can't go wrong with this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Vera Klimkovsky

customer_reviews.title: Quality over Quantity!!!
customer_reviews.text: First time amazon reviewer!! Let’s me start by saying last week I ordered the big, cheap bag of Matcha DNA. The price was just too good to turn down I had no idea about the difference in matcha quality, but read up on reddit that the green it is the better So I ordered this matcha, a bit more expensive, but the quality is just so much better. It’s smoother and I actually feel the effects with this one. It tastes a hell of a lot better too I mean just look at the difference in quality between matcha dna and this brand (the brown poo poo one is matcha dna)
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Matcha Green tea powder tastes fresh, nice color and great texture
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy my daily cup of green tea matcha in a latte. I found the taste to be smooth, fresh with a nice texture and color to it. It's a great product that I would recommend highly to green tea lovers. It's great and healthy, the price is reasonable too. The product is also organic from Japon which is more reliable than any other similar products on the market. Thank you, Evy
customer_reviews.author: Evy

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!
customer_reviews.text: This matcha was a very vibrant green color and the smell is amazing! I love the fact that it doesn't give me the jitters like coffee (although I do STILL llove coffee too) and the energetic feeling lasts significantly longer than coffee. My only issues are I wish the packaging was a can or something easier to seal without the worry of puffing green tea powder in your face. The other thing is that there was NO nutrition label or information. Other than that, everything was great. Despite my small dislikes, I don't feel that it had any impact on the products flavor or quality. Still delicious!
customer_reviews.author: ARS

customer_reviews.title: Dissolves Very Well!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the way this match green tea dissolves! It is very fresh and the flavor is just enough earthy without being overbearing in my lattes. I have experienced more clarity and alertness from drinking my second day. The only thing I wish was that there was a long spoon or scoop that came inside the bag since the product is so low down and it tends to get on your knuckles. I like to keep it in the bag in the fridge instead of transferring to another container so it remains fresh; so adding a long handled scoop in the bag or making a shorter bag would make it less messy.
customer_reviews.author: SpeedmomSC

customer_reviews.title: Strongest one I have bought.
customer_reviews.text: If you enjoy the taste of green tea, this is an awesome product. It is a VERY small quantity, but if you are looking for quality, this is a great product. There are MUCH cheaper versions of this if you don't need the best. It is very strong tasting, so I would suggest for a first timer to buy a less expensive version before jumping into the high end.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Condrey

customer_reviews.title: If your a Matcha lover
customer_reviews.text: If your a Matcha lover but can't get over the cost of some brands, this is by far the best quality and quantity for your money. I've been blending it with almond milk or soy milk for Matcha Late at home, and for heath benefits, after my first cup of coffee in the morning I drink Matcha (late) through the rest of the day. It makes a difference in my concentration and sustained energy through the day.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth E. Thurston

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: Something is definitely up with this powder.. I’ve had many types of matcha and this was the only kind that has ever given me awful heartburn and honestly it just doesn’t taste right. I’m wondering if it’s cut with something else, or maybe food dye is added? Needless to say it’s going straight in the trash as the vendor does not accept returns..
customer_reviews.author: Lauren C

customer_reviews.title: Super tiny Old and stale
customer_reviews.text: So I been wanting some of this for a while I went n got this products because they got food reviews but when I received it , it was not fresh at all It took the boiling water so much to blend in with the powder it was clumpy n just looked n tasted old , the bag was tiny n flat. Maybe three spoonfuls just not worth it now I can’t return it because I opened it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Williams

customer_reviews.title: Matcha green tea powder
customer_reviews.text: I am new to Matcha so I don’t have a lot to compare this matcha to but I really like this tea. The taste is flavorful and pleasant. I also noticed that I can drink matcha instead of coffee and it keeps me alert but doesn’t cause jitters or sleep problems. I’ve drank it at night and went to sleep just fine. Seller also sent me a recipe book which is helpful to those who are just starting with matcha and need ideas on how to use it. So far my most favorite way to enjoy matcha is mixing it with hot water and milk and adding a bit of honey.
customer_reviews.author: NAT

customer_reviews.title: The most affordable and good quality matcha
customer_reviews.text: This matcha has a beautiful green color which is not much different from ceremonial matcha (I use Junbi ceremonial matcha). The taste is not bitter at all. I wanted to use a cheaper matcha to make lattes; the lattes I made using this matcha and the cermonial matcha were almost identical :) I could only notice the difference (not as flavorful and aromatic as ceremonial grade) when I whisk up just the powder and hot water. For the price and quality, I give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Hao

customer_reviews.title: Instant energy and uplifted mood!
customer_reviews.text: I just received my matcha order. I put about a quarter teaspoon in a glass of water and psyllium powder. The taste was mild. But what a shock! Within a short time, I noticed my mood was lifted and I had more energy. Felt like magic. Love this matcha!
customer_reviews.author: Southern Belle

customer_reviews.title: Hesitant
customer_reviews.text: My first Japanese Matcha. Nice bright green, tried only a little so far, is more bitter than I'd like but probably is very good culinary grade. Only says from Japan, meaning possibly grown and sourced from more than one region possibly at different distances from the disaster? Hesitating to use anymore given how govts and the media are clearly suppressing info on radiation contamination from the nuclear disaster. Online searches sadly yield zero results past 2012 or so.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael

customer_reviews.title: Tasty.Healthy, not Artsy Fartsy
customer_reviews.text: Among culinary grades this is a good buy, and makes a decent cup of tea. The flavor and fineness (blending quality) is better than many similarly-priced, organically produced brands. For morning tea with good flavor and the health benefits (theanine, catechins) this is a better way to go than many others you will find in pretty black and green packages. It's way better than spending double the cost on fancy schmancy ceremonial grade teas.
customer_reviews.author: gmtenor

customer_reviews.title: Great boost of energy and taste amazing
customer_reviews.text: The tea has a very smooth taste and also smells great! I mix half a teaspoon in hot water,no milk is required for my taste. However,I'm sure I'll try a latte in the cooler months.I haven't experienced an aftertaste and the bag is actually sufficient for multiple use.I currently drink 3 cups day and have noticed a boost in focus and energy. I also take a multivitamin and fish oil.I have noticed spotting with my current birth control which is unusual for me so ladies beware. Hopefully, my hormones can adjust to the new addition!
customer_reviews.author: Maressa Mills

customer_reviews.title: Great taste and health benefits
customer_reviews.text: First time we’ve had matcha and the flavor is really nice. Health benefits are great and the caffeine gives a benefit longer through the day with clear thinking. My senior Mom also enjoyed and said she walks longer now that she’s introduced it into her day.
customer_reviews.author: C Foushee

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Green Tea Powder
customer_reviews.text: This green tea powder is authentic. Bright beautiful green and tried this today in a Matcha Frap. Fantastic! Haven’t had a chance to go to SB lately so making this at home is just as good and probably healthier too with less sugar and 2% Milk.
customer_reviews.author: B Plus Plus

customer_reviews.title: Favorite matcha
customer_reviews.text: So far this is my favorite matcha, after trying 4-5 different brands. Works great for smoothies and lattes. Maybe not as strong or green as some others, but suits my taste and is a good value. Has a nice mild flavor and doesn't clump for me when used in a frother or blender. My only small complaint is the method of packaging (a sturdy, zip top bag .. hard to get product off bottom) but I remedy that by placing in an airtight container.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna P.

customer_reviews.title: LOVELOVELOVE
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this matcha. Doing some research it seems that the brighter the pigment the fresher and better quality of the matcha. This powder is such a beautiful BRIGHT green. he flavor is what you expect with matcha, very strong. I love putting this powder in with some vanilla almond milk. I use it every morning and will continue to get this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa Brouck

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting matcha!
customer_reviews.text: Great tasting matcha!! Bought a small size just to sample and ended up making another purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Viet

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time trying matcha green tea and it does not disappoint. I feel more alert, focused, and overall better after drinking the tea. I have now been adding it to my smoothies and alternating between coffee and matcha tea. Fantastic product and tastes great.
customer_reviews.author: Hilight44

customer_reviews.title: We love this brand.
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I used to try a different matcha every month, but we settled on this brand. We love the quality and taste. We usually only use half a tablespoon and mix it into steamed almond milk, and we add honey. Tip: Add some maca root powder, for added benefits! It's our favorite hot drink in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: R. Rossi

customer_reviews.title: Best Smelling Matcha
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best matcha I've ever ordered. Smells just like sweet grass. Great color. I have an official bowl and whisk and make my smoothies without heating up the matcha. Like so: pour some coconut/almond milk combo (you can buy it at Ralphs) into alarge bottle. Pour some agave syrup and honey into the bottle. In a bowl, spoon some of the matcha and pour a small amount of the milk. Just a little more than to make a paste. Whisk away and then pour into bottle. All that's left is to shake, shake, shake
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Though I'm not an expert on matcha, this seems to be a very good value. The only improvement I can suggest is to make a different closure on the package. I like that it's "greener" than the tins, but sometimes the matcha dust can make closing the zip top difficult, and even when it is closed securely, there's still dust on the margin above the zipper. Not a huge deal, though. Overall an excellent value!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Matcha Lover!
customer_reviews.text: I have been drinking Matcha Tea Latte's for a few years now and this is one of the best I've had. I usually get ceremonial grade and this is better as far as the taste and the color. You can generally tell by color if it's good quality or not by the bright green. The dull green matcha is a lower grade and generally bitter but it's okay for cooking. The only downfall is I wish this was a larger container, it doesn't last long when I drink it every day. Typically 1 tsp. per latte. I will buy this again for sure. Hopefully they will sell larger bags soon.
customer_reviews.author: ScrappinGirl

customer_reviews.title: Broken Package when Received
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to try this product but when I received it, the package was opened. I tried to do a return/refund or at least tried to exchange it but I don’t even have the option. Complete waste of money. I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a dozen different brands of matcha on amazon and this product takes me to the next level. Thank You Matcha Wellness!
customer_reviews.author: shanng99

customer_reviews.title: Taste great
customer_reviews.text: I'm a newbie to green tea. Based on reviews that I had read, I went with this one. Excellent decision by me. This one taste great, that's all I can say about it. I did used to work at Peet's Coffee and Tea, and there is matcha there, but this one is much better than I recall Peet's matcha being.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it as green tea latte (ice/hot)
customer_reviews.text: I love it as green tea latte (ice/hot). It was a small sampler bag and I had used only 1 teaspoon and part milk and water in a 10oz cup. This will last a short while for me. It had a hint of grassy flavor but that's to be expected because it's only culinary grade and not ceremonial grade. Still, it's good enough to make lattes and other green tea flavored desserts out of. I would purchase this brand again because the tea leaves are organic and they are from Japan and not China.
customer_reviews.author: W F

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good matcha at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Really like that this matcha foams up very nice. I love my foam! The one downside to this one is it's a bit flaky, not fine powder. That being said, I noticed after I bought it, it said it's culinary grade. So given the great price and it's supposed to be culinary grade, I am satisfied. I will definitely continue drinking this as my morning cup of matcha that's not crazy expensive. I do sift it so it's more of the fine powder it should be, only take a few seconds to do that, and it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Amy CC

customer_reviews.title: I've been trying many brands.  Highest score to this one for flavor, freshness, presentation.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Superior Culinary in the packet. My first couple of cups I was surprised to find the tea lumped up in warm water and did not dissolve BUT tasted so good. So now I pass it through a small cup-sized plastic sieve to sift the lumps and it blends beautifully. Perhaps the lumps are just do to higher moisture content? The color is excellent, the flavor strong but smooth. I mix it up for morning soy lattes. It does seem to have more of a caffeine hit that the other 3 brands I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: K. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and naturally sweet matcha!
customer_reviews.text: This matcha is a beautiful kelly green! Upon opening the bag it smelled so earthy sweet and the flavor delivered exactly that! I won’t buy another brand for fear it wouldn’t be right, this one is it! I do think they could package this better, it’s not terrible but I think maybe in a canister would make it more accessible, it’s hard to measure with so much bag room. I also think it is worth noting that the energy given from the tea is so clean and there is not crashing, it’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to try this Matcha but am pretty disappointed. I understand the eco friendly packaging but it makes getting the product out a little difficult because the opening is so small, the package in general is really small. It's also not the best tasting matcha that I've ever had and has a tendency to clump, making it just ok.
customer_reviews.author: 2k's

customer_reviews.title: I love the taste
customer_reviews.text: There is this matcha frappuccino I get from the Kaiser hospital cafe. It is delicious but of course I can not get during the lock down. So I looked for a recipe and read about different matcha teas. This one is exactly what I was looking for to mimic the frappuccino. I use nut milk, equal , vanilla and 1 1/2 teaspoon matcha tea blended. It is what I wanted and taste great. Easy to blend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Awesome quality at a great price. This is real matcha from Japan not green tea powder from China. It is bright green in color and delicious. I have tried many different "matchas" sold on Amazon and have been quite disappointed with the quality, usually a brownish-olive color with bitter taste. This matcha is definitely superior quality and taste. I also drink the ceremonial matcha which I drink only once a week due to it's cost. I drink this tea everyday, excellent flavor and I love the price!
customer_reviews.author: Adel

customer_reviews.title: Niceee
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! The color isn't like the picture (of course) however I'd say this is an A grade matcha from the internet! It's color is nice and dark green and tastes fresh! Absolutely recommend this! However, I didn't like the packaging. I feel like a can would have done better?
customer_reviews.author: Selena

customer_reviews.title: Best matcha for Price
customer_reviews.text: When I saw that this matcha was only $9 for an oz I was like that can't be good. I've been buying matcha for years, I only like one brand but now make that too.. for the price point this is some kick ass matcha. Definitely will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: kyle

customer_reviews.title: I love it so MATCHA
customer_reviews.text: Omg I had to write this review! I’m super picky with the flavor of matcha not because I’m a matcha snob but because I get headaches right away if it’s not pure Grade matcha for some reason. This checked all of the boxes. It’s super smooth and tasty. I went to their website and they have some great education on matcha and what to look for and what to watch out for when buying this delicate delicious little tea. Very honest. Just purchased a second bag after one cup :) don’t want to run low. Ever!
customer_reviews.author: Mae T

customer_reviews.title: Some of the best matcha I have come across
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this matcha as it was a lightning deal. I enjoy drinking matcha and saw review on this brand that compared it to ceremonial matcha from other companies. For the price it was definitely worth trying so i did. I have to admit that this is better than other brands ceremonial grade and the owner of the company even sent me an email before i received my product that highlighted the proper ways to use it ect. I have been drinking it everyday and will definitely continue to support this brand as this stuff is top notch. The next go round I will try their ceremonial grade as this one surpassed all my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Solomon

customer_reviews.title: tastes great, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I add this to my smoothies every morning. It tastes great and I feel like it provides me with some great energy. I recommend using slightly less than what is recommended on the package - too much and your drink can be a bit bitter. Its a relatively small pouch for the price, but its a very finely ground powder so a little bit goes a long way. If you order matcha tea from your favorite coffee shop, making your own at home is very easy and it will save you money!
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Smelled and tasted like fish
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to receive my matcha powder package but I was surprised when it smelled and tasted fishy... confused I looked it up and it’s not supposed to taste or smell that way. It also really upset my stomach. Tried to return the package or contact seller but I wasn’t able to. I’m very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Llambias

customer_reviews.title: MatCHA!
customer_reviews.text: It truly is a good quality Matcha, the coloring and grade is what helps to identify good quality along with taste. I had to order a second packet as I will soon be finishing mine. For a longer freshness be sure to store it in the fridge. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Tania

customer_reviews.title: Very smooth, fresh, great quality.
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t know what I was missing. I drink matcha daily and my budget hasn’t really allowed for ceremonial grade but this is way more premium than the other culinary grade matchas I used to purchase. It’s SUPER green, not bitter, mixes well, and gives me clean energy. When I drink often, my stomach stays flat.
customer_reviews.author: Soulrich

customer_reviews.title: Good matcha.
customer_reviews.text: Good matcha. Color was bright like the picture unlike other brands. No bitterness and tasted good. Will buy again. The matcha that was recommended by Amazon was pale green and bitter. Buy this, it cost more but much better.
customer_reviews.author: Hung Tran

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and do recommend
customer_reviews.text: I bought this about a month ago and let me tell you, I love it it’s true to the color, flavor. I ordered it because I am 55 years old and always looking for something to help me in my health and life it self, I have noticed more energy, when I am exercising I feel great. It has help me lose weight love it love it.
customer_reviews.author: jim

customer_reviews.title: Amazing flavor! I work out several hours a day ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing flavor! I work out several hours a day at the gym, and this is put pep back in my step! Makes me feel so much better than coffee and it's better for me! I put mine in the vita mix blender with ice, almond milk, a tiny chunk of been Hannah and vegan protein powder! It's way better than the Starbucks version
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Thornlow

customer_reviews.title: Great choice
customer_reviews.text: This is a great in-between for ceremonial grade and culinary grade. It's not as high quality as ceremonial grade but it's a close runner up. Since ceremonial grade is a cleaner and lighter in taste, it's not something that you would use in mixed drinks. But with this one, it's great in mixed drinks and is still good enough to drink as is.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Energy
customer_reviews.text: Great for bombproof matcha. I'm doing the keto diet but I cannot drink the bulletproof coffee because coffee causes me many side effects, so I was looking for an alternative to coffee and found an article on Google about the wonders of matcha and I even found a recipe to make the bombproof matcha. Results, I find that the benefits are greater and it helps me maintain my energy levels during intermittent fasting. Excellent product, thanks
customer_reviews.author: Pink N.

customer_reviews.title: A MUST BUY
customer_reviews.text: I have bought many version's of match powder and I was VERY PLEASED with this one, the taste is matched with that if the expensive ceremonial grade used in Japan
customer_reviews.author: aesmith

customer_reviews.title: This item was so disappointing It has a very harsh bitter taste
customer_reviews.text: This item was so disappointing It has a very harsh bitter taste and NOW i find it can not be returned Will try to contact Amazon when they open again Very expensive for what came
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: Good until it's not
customer_reviews.text: The first two bags I got were quite nice, green, flavorful, and invigorating. Then I got a bag that was old and puke green in color (brown tinted) that tasted very bad, bitter and ultimately undrinkable. Unfortunately, there's a no return policy, so it's just money down the drain. Canceled my auto-delivery and looking for another brand...again. :(
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Albrecht

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for home made lattes
customer_reviews.text: I was really skeptical of purchasing Matcha online because there’s so many with mixed reviews, this Matcha is worth the price. I got really tired of spending 5-6$ multiple times a week to meet my cravings and now I can make my own lattes at home. Good quality and taste 👍
customer_reviews.author: SF

customer_reviews.title: Makes me jittery but is high quality.
customer_reviews.text: A little goes a long way! I put 2 tsp and instantly got the jitters which I never got when drinking coffee... I suggest 1 c of hot water and 1/2 - 1 tsp of green matcha. I also like putting creamy homemade almond milk in it. Coffee makes me tired! Matcha gives me energy, but again start with less!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel B

customer_reviews.title: Very fresh and tastes great
customer_reviews.text: This is a higher cost than other matcha powders and a small bag, but for blending with just hot water it has one of the better tastes and fresh green color. I keep it for this purpose (just mix with hot water) but I use a little cheaper matcha for smoothies. This one is kind of my more expensive treat.....
customer_reviews.author: Sitabai

customer_reviews.title: Really SMALL
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited looking toward a nice warm cup of matcha but when it finally arrived I was so disappointed all my excitement disappeared in that moment. This is a literal catfish I thought the size was going to be bigger but it’s only one ounce. On top of that the serving size is not even on the packaging smh 🤦🏾‍♀️ But if you’re looking for a small package go ahead I haven’t decided if I’m going to try it or return it kind of a waist of money lol
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's smaller than what I expected; It's a small pouch so if you drink Matcha daily, this pouch won't last very long (I use 1 tsp each cup and I drink 2 cups per day). 5 star because for the price i think it's good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Aya

customer_reviews.title: My Go To Match
customer_reviews.text: I must have tried over 20 different kinds of Matcha in this price range and I always come back to this one. Beautifully bright green and less bitter than others in this category. It's definitely the household favorite.
customer_reviews.author: pr0ph3cy

customer_reviews.title: Superior Culinary Matcha
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with the quality and price of this Matcha. I'm not an expert or connoisseur but I've tried some other competitively priced Matcha and some more expensive Matcha. Eco Heed is sweeter than Matcha in the same price range and as light and bright as the more expensive culinary grade tea I've tried. This is the best bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.author: BobbiG

customer_reviews.title: New comer to matcha tea
customer_reviews.text: I tried another brand, a ceremonial matcha and now this brand a culinary matcha. It tastes similiar. The culinary is slightly bitter. However, when add milk it masked the bitterness. So i would definitely buy the culinary simply because of price difference. To me, matcha tea is very bland, but kind of grassy. I am drinking it because of the healthy reviews
customer_reviews.author: GP

customer_reviews.title: Delicious quality matcha
customer_reviews.text: Great for baking or drinking as lattes. It is a bright vibrant green with a strong grassy flavor. I like this matcha quite a bit and would repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: For the price it should not be expected to be that good anyway. I tried drinking it plain and in latte form. I dont like the taste and the color is not very vibrant. I use it for making face masks instead. I drink another matcha that is ceremonial grade.
customer_reviews.author: NonaT

customer_reviews.title: Authentic Japanese macha
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous, beautiful color and smell. You can tell it's high quality authentic Japanese macha from the moment you open the package. Tastes exactly the same as the macha I had while in japan.
customer_reviews.author: Melody Hartman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best matcha I have found out there. Incredible price. The color is amazing and The Taste is just as good
customer_reviews.author: tyler

customer_reviews.title: Yummy and smooth!
customer_reviews.text: Such a nice Organic superior Matcha ,and at a good price point . It Blends well and taste really smooth. I’ve only had it so far mixed with hot almond milk and honey . So Delicious! You won’t go wrong choosing this matcha. My only suggestion would be to change the packaging to a tin or bamboo box. I feel like you would loose less product.
customer_reviews.author: Tiameka Jastillana

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: It is a small bag so if you want to use it for baking you will go though it fast; I use it for making hot lattes and adding it into my morning smoothie and it is really good. It is very bright and green and smells fresh. I feel energized without feeling jittery. I will repurchase
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: finally found my go to matcha
customer_reviews.text: finally found my go to matcha! I am very pleased with the flavor, color, aroma, and texture. I have tried several varieties of organic matcha. this one requires less tea for great cup of matcha tea. No dirt flavor, just a nice nutty and slightly grassy taste. As an aside, I broke my "bowl" and instead of purchasing a new bowl to whisk the powder into an emulsion, I am using the aerolatte frother in my cup. This works even better and leaves a nice little foam at the top, that I was never able to accomplish with the whisk. I will be purchasing this Matcha again and again.
customer_reviews.author: cpdr

customer_reviews.title: Amazing taste, excellent matcha tea
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful tasting matcha ceremonial grade /Superior culinary grade tea! For the price and size u can't beat it ,I'm a daily matcha drinker n very picky as to taste n color this brand will not disappoint! I will buy again,took a chance as my normal brand was out so glad I did ! Still has the beifiets of matcha so good for u plus the boost of energy I can't do without! Higlly recommended amazing taste a must try! Mixes easy with no chalky after tase! On my second order!
customer_reviews.author: mrshryan1215

customer_reviews.title: delicious and has anti-cancer benefits and other health benefits
customer_reviews.text: I heard from friend about the health benefits of matcha as well as its anti-cancer benefits. I heated some unsweetened almond milk and stirred a 1/2 tsp. into a small amount of the almond milk. stirred until smooth. then added some stevia and some Swerve sweetener [tastes like sugar but isn't]. delicious and beautiful in my turquoise mug. the matcha stirred into the warm almond milk just fine and there were no lumps.
customer_reviews.author: annabella

customer_reviews.title: Call Me Mellow
customer_reviews.text: I like a daily mid-morning cup of matcha but don't want to spend for top grade ceremonial tea. Here's what I think: Pros: Good color, mixes well with no clumps, good flavor, mixes well with additives such as grass fed butter and bone protein powder, leaves a nice swirl pattern on surface, and good price point. Cons: Not ceremonial grade but oh well.
customer_reviews.author: John3

customer_reviews.title: Funny after taste and little in the packet
customer_reviews.text: I am dissatisfied with the quality of this particular matcha green tea. It was very little in the packet. I question the quality, as it gave me a weird after taste. I drink ALOT of matcha green tea and never experienced this before, yuck. This was my first and last time buying this brand. Such a waste of $10 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: written by Tandreia

customer_reviews.title: Overdue product
customer_reviews.text: my product came with a validation date of september 27, 2019. I would to get my money back, because that’s definitely not okay, my product is extremely overdue.
customer_reviews.author: Cassiano Brandt

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Matcha
customer_reviews.text: I lived in Japan for about 5 years and enjoyed traditional and organic Matcha while living over there on many occasions. I introduced Matcha to my mother, a soap maker, and we decided to find some good organic matcha to try in a soap. We created a lovely soap that we titled "Bamboo Matcha". Pictured are some of the soaps including the Bamboo Matcha soap that we created. I also enjoyed this matcha in it's more traditional form and I must confess that it was absolutely delcisious. I would absolutely recommend this to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Anne Havel

customer_reviews.title: I’ve met my matcha at last
customer_reviews.text: Matcha was recommended to me by a couple of people who know my appreciation for green tea. I ordered the starter bag to give it a try and have found it very much to my liking. The earthy, tannery taste might not appeal to all, but if you like good green tea, the taste will be familiar and pleasantly. I’ve used it in smoothies and mixed with both hot and cold water. I didn’t realize quite how small the starter bag was but it makes sense now that I realize how relatively inexpensive it was to buy, and I still haven’t used it up so it’s fine.
customer_reviews.author: Roni

customer_reviews.title: Quality/taste
customer_reviews.text: I loved the taste so rich but yet soft at the same time, very smooth and the color is amazing. The package was kind of small for those ppl that drink alot of matcha but for me it was good since I don't drink alot of matcha. Who knows maybe after this I will change my mind, then again I dont know how long package will last. I loved it!
customer_reviews.author: L. Silva

customer_reviews.title: HUGE FAN
customer_reviews.text: Really like this Matcha Green Tea Powder. I make matcha lattes at home in the mornings. I like the packaging, slim and sturdy - it kept the matcha fresh for the month that I used it. I've noticed some of the other brands matcha oxidizing more turning more brownish green by the time I reach the bottom of the package and then the matcha tastes funny. I've tried a few other brands through Amazon and so far this is my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: I love the way it makes me feel!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my new favorite thing!! I've been using it a couple weeks now and I have to say it makes me alert but happy!! I usually do a partial energy drink in the morning but I haven't needed it! I've only used 1 tsp per cup (I'm still trying to get the blending technique down). I do half hot water to dissolve and then fill with almond milk. It's pretty earthy so I need the milk! I'll definitely be reordering when I run out!! Also, I'm a personal trainer so I'm kind of experimenting to see the validity of the health benefits!
customer_reviews.author: Shar

customer_reviews.title: It's good
customer_reviews.text: Don't really have any complaints, but based off the sellers page I thought this would taste noticeably better than other brands. Really no difference to other stuff I have tried. Plus the bag is tiny. Looks bigger in the picture. No biggie though.
customer_reviews.author: sav

customer_reviews.title: Worth trying if need energy!
customer_reviews.text: At first I wasn't sure I would be buying this again because you don't get much for the $10 price. I made it according to the instructions with soy milk and it reminded me of spinach! I have been feeling tired and sluggish for so long, but after only a few days of drinking this, I do notice a boost in energy and ability to think more clearly. So if this continues, I will be reordering. Four stars only because it is expensive, but worth trying!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy M.

product_meta.title: Matcha Green Tea Powder - Superior Culinary - USDA Organic From Japan -Natural Energy & Focus Booster Packed With Antioxidants. (Starter Bag - 30g (1.05oz))
feature_bullets: Start Your Day With a Cup of Matcha Wellness - Feel the inner peace & clear mind a cup of Matcha tea brings
Experience the gentle & uplifting steady energy flow without the “jitters” or “caffeine crash”. A refreshing energy hit that will have you coming back for more
First time drinking matcha? Confused with too many choices? - If you’re looking for the perfect balance of high quality & affordable price, your search is over
USDA & JAS Certified Organic, our premium matcha green tea powder is BRIGHT GREEN in color & has a FRESH GRASSY Aroma. Produced in the Uji region of Japan
Love it or your money back – if you’re not satisfied with our matcha, just send us an email for a full refund
